ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of celery soup

cookingTips: Layer chicken on bottom of slow cooker, then pour sauce over top for even cooking
Cook on low 6-8 hours or high 3-4 hours until chicken is tender and cooked through
Add sour cream in the last 30 minutes to prevent separation from heat
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This quick dinner uses convenience products efficiently - how do the two cream soups create a richer sauce than one alone?
